code: import axios from"axios";const URL='https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com';export const usersRequest=()=>{return axios.get(URL+'/users');};export const postsByUser=id=>{return axios.get(URL+'/posts?userId='+id);};export const selectedPost=id=>{return axios.get(URL+'/posts/'+id);};export const albumsByUser=userId=>{return axios.get(URL+'/albums?userId='+userId);};export const photosByAlbum=albumId=>{return axios.get(URL+'/photos?albumId='+albumId);};export const selectedPhoto=id=>{return axios.get(URL+'/photos/'+id);};
